name: Large Round Point Selenite Stilo Wand
description:
Discover the enchanting allure of our exquisitely crafted Selenite Stilo Wands, designed with a sleek, pointed end to channel energy with precision. Standing at a graceful 14.5 cm in height and measuring 1.7 cm in both width and depth, these radiant wands are sculpted from pure, luminous selenite, known for its ethereal glow and powerful cleansing properties.

Perfect for spiritual wellness practitioners and white witches alike, these wands are treasured tools in energy toolkits, ideal for meditation, chakra alignment, and magical rituals. Let the serene, high-vibrational energy of selenite elevate your spiritual practice, bringing clarity, peace, and divine connection into your sacred space.
